org.springframework.boot.task

Packages that use org.springframework.boot.task
Package
Description
org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.integration
Auto-configuration for Spring Integration.
org.springframework.boot.task
Utilities and classes related to task execution and scheduling.
  • Classes in org.springframework.boot.task used by org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.integration

    Description
    TaskSchedulerBuilder
    Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    since 3.2.0 for removal in 3.4.0 in favor of ThreadPoolTaskSchedulerBuilder
    ThreadPoolTaskSchedulerBuilder
    Builder that can be used to configure and create a ThreadPoolTaskScheduler.

    Builder that can be used to configure and create a SimpleAsyncTaskExecutor.
